codelist.title: Filter Classification Codes specific to Apprenticeships questions

code.title: When does a course start - provide a Date in line with https://github.com/Crown-Commercial-Service/ccs-data-model/tree/master/gen/reference_data/v0/supplementary_data_type_codes#date
